titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DIVISION OF QUESTION - Mr. Menendez demanded that the question of adoption of the resolution be divided. The question was divided.
On agreeing to the portion electing the Chaplain of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Passed House without amendment. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Jeffrey J. Trandahl as Clerk; (2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James M. Eagen, III as Chief Administrative Officer; and (4) Father Daniel P. Coughlin as Chaplain.
